text: The Witterings is an electoral ward of Chichester District, West Sussex, England and returns three members to sit on Chichester District Council. Following a district boundary review, The Witterings was created from the East Wittering and West Wittering wards in 2019. ==Councillor== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="4"|Year!!Member!!Party!!Member!!Party!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | || style="background-color: " | || style="background-color: " | |2019 |Graeme Barrett ||Conservative |Elizabeth Hamilton ||Conservative |Susan Taylor ||Conservative |} ==Election results== ==References== ==External links== * Chichester District Council * Election Maps Witterings
title: The Witterings (ward)
